title: Home page underwater theme redesign with 3 feature CTA boxes

requirements.summary: Redesign Home page styling to a professional underwater theme using existing ocean design tokens while preserving current top navigation behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: Home page background and major sections visually reflect a professional underwater/ocean theme (e.g., deep-ocean gradients, subtle highlights) and do not use the current sky/light-blue gradient styling.
The existing header navigation buttons (Home, Profile, Google Map, Comment, Calculate) still navigate to the same pages as before via the existing onNavigate callback.
No changes are required to backend canister code.

file_operations.description: Update the Home page container, header, hero, and footer styling to use the existing underwater/ocean Tailwind tokens (e.g., ocean-deep/ocean-mid/ocean-surface) with a more professional deep-ocean gradient and typography, replacing the current sky/light-blue gradient. Preserve all existing onNavigate() callbacks and button labels/structure so navigation behavior remains unchanged. Use the shadcn-ui Button component for all CTAs and nav actions (Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing). Ensure layout spacing accounts for the fixed footer so page content remains accessible.

requirements.summary: Add a responsive bottom section on the Home page with 3 feature boxes and CTAs that navigate to existing pages.
acceptanceCriteria: The Home page shows a bottom section with 3 boxed cards in one row on desktop/tablet; on small screens they stack vertically with appropriate spacing.

Box 1 content is exactly: Title: "Interactive Map"; Description: "Search ocean locations and view real time environmental readings including PH,turbidity and oxygen level"; CTA button/option label: "Explore Map"; clicking navigates to the existing map page (onNavigate('map')).

Box 2 content is exactly: Title: "Coral Reef Health Index"; Description: "calculate the health status of coral reefs based on water temperature and PH value. Get  detailed Impacts and recommendations."; CTA button/option label: "Calculate index"; clicking navigates to the existing calculate page (onNavigate('calculate')).

Box 3 exists with Title: "Comment" and includes a CTA that navigates to the existing comment page (onNavigate('comment')). (If no description text is provided by the user, keep description minimal and professional.)
The bottom 3-box section is not obscured by the footer; page content remains accessible without overlapping fixed elements.

file_operations.description: Add a new bottom section below the hero that renders three responsive boxed feature cards (3-column grid on md+; stacked on small screens). Ensure each card uses the exact provided titles/descriptions/CTA labels for boxes 1 and 2, and a minimal professional description for box 3, and wire each CTA click to the correct onNavigate('map'|'calculate'|'comment') call. Keep the fixed footer from obscuring the new section by adding sufficient bottom padding/margin to the scrollable content. Use shadcn-ui Button for each CTA (Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing).
